Reviews.Title: I got a replacement, it works really well
Reviews.Author: Stacy K.
Reviews.Content: My first purchase was defective, apparently.  For the money, you probably won't find a better camera than this.  It uses an SD memory card (not provided) and two AA batteries (also not provided).  But it does include a USB cable for connecting to your computer so you can download and edit your photos.  If you have a Mac with iPhoto, that's all you need to do.  If you have a PC, you'll probably have to install the provided software.

Reviews.Title: Good cheap camera
Reviews.Author: usa
Reviews.Content: This is the second one I bought. The first one is still working amid kid abuse. I bought both of these for my little boys and they love them-- so easy to use and durable. And it can save you hundreds in repairs if you have kids and an expensive camera--give them this one and maybe they will leave yours alone.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Shirley J. Millican
Reviews.Content: Cute, inexpensive digital camera.  Took me a little while to figure out how to insert the batteries, though, and how to get them back out.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Mangosur "I am"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera from a competitor a year ago and the picture quality is okay.  However, the software that came with it so I could transfer the pictures to my computer now "quits unexpectedly" and I am no longer able to view, print or transfer any of the photos that are my computer.  When I notified Vivitar support dept., they offered no solution to my problem.  I will never get another vivitar camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera...
Reviews.Author: Philip Leete
Reviews.Content: We got this for our nephew.  He is 6 years old.Note: I am not giving this 5 stars because I had assumed that the 100 picture ability in the advertisement meant that it's internal memory was enough to hold some photos.  Not the case.  I found an old 1G SD card and then got 707 pictures at the highest resolution.  So that was more then okay.The 4.1 mega pixels looks great on my computer, even when I zoom in.  I have not tried printing but don't foresee any issues.  The lack of flash does mean that it's low light is not so great but you get a much longer battery life with out it.  Over all, it's a great little camera.  I hope it is slightly shock resistant but only time will tell how it holds up to a 1st grader's abuse.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: Purchased together with an sd card that amazon bundled with it, and the camera was not even working.it said card error, and it took one photo, that is it. I should have read the reviews before i bought it. I could not even return it, because we were on vacation when i opened it, and the packaging is lost.

Reviews.Title: Lousy
Reviews.Author: Daniel Boudreault
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my pre-schooler, but the photos are so bad, I trashed the camera...I would not recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: bad buy
Reviews.Author: amyvenus
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera as a Christmas present. It lasted four months before dying. Please don't waste your money on this one.

Reviews.Title: takes pics but not reliable
Reviews.Author: Meredith B. McElveen
Reviews.Content: Nice pictures not great, no flash, images are a bit fuzzy. However some of the time images will just dissapear as if the camera reset on its own.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kerry Mann
Reviews.Content: I had an older camera that was sort of big and clunky but worked well, this new one is much lighter and more compact and takes nice pictures, for the price I feel its worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: Blurry and Grainy photos
Reviews.Author: Cathy
Reviews.Content: Images were horrible. Blurry and Grainy. I cant believe they say it has 4MP. My old 2MP camera phone does better. I found great used cameras were less money, higher resolution and better options.

Reviews.Title: Zoom , rotate, enhance, 35 to 40, enhance.
Reviews.Author: Larry Hall
Reviews.Content: Vivitar, purveyors of fine camera systems, does it again with this totem of  par excellence. Truly a  marvel of engineering. Photos are like dusky jewels of moments in time, captured , like tears in the rain. So, next time you are at Tan Hauser Gate , I hope you have a Vivitar V46-BLK...

ProductInfo.Features:
Preview screen is 1.5 inches
4.1 Megapixels
Comes with software, USB cable, Quick Start Guide, and a wrist strap
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar V46-PUR 4MP Digital Camera with 1.5-Inch LCD Screen - Body Only (Purple)
